title: Can't log in????
body:
Correct password and username, but suddenly can't log in???

What's going on????

replies.body: We started having a few login issues a couple hours ago, but it seems like they have been cleared up by now per the status page. If you're still having problems getting logged in, let's try updating some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and also be sure to flush your DNS. If that doesn't help, reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for a little more troubleshooting.
It works now after waiting a bit, but thank you for the explanation!
Service Status has been updated to indicate the issue
